title:
A simple
Modern OS.
about_desc_1: ArcirisOS is a modern, open-source operating system designed for simplicity, security, and speed. Built from the ground up with a custom init system and asynchronous package management, ArcirisOS offers a streamlined experience for both developers and everyday users.
about_list_1: Minimal resource usage and fast boot times
about_list_2: Unique noa-bootstrap init for precise service control
about_list_4: Transparent, auditable, and reversible system changes
about_list_5: Designed for reliability and ease of use
about_desc_2: Whether you are a developer seeking a customizable platform or a user looking for a secure and beautiful OS, ArcirisOS is built to empower you.
custom_init_system_desc: ArcirisOS uses its own init sequence built with noa-bootstrap, enabling minimal overhead and precise control over system startup and service management.
async_pkg_verfication_desc: The iris package manager performs integrity checks on packages, ensuring system reliability without slowing down boot times.
secure_by_design_desc:
ArcirisOS tracks installed files for each package and can detect accidental corruption during package operations
 All changes are verifiable, auditable, and reversible
download_page_desc:

In the meantime, you can explore our GitHub repository to see the development progress.
footer_download_txt: Installer, ISO, and documentation will be available soon.
contributors_desc: Meet the amazing people who make ArcirisOS possible through their dedication and contributions.
contributors_click_desc: Click the image above to view detailed contribution statistics on GitHub
contributors_want_desc: ArcirisOS is an open-source project and we welcome contributions from developers of all skill levels.
